turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: This is your property manager - what seems to be broken in your unit today?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: My fridge is making a loud noise and not cooling

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, so the fridge is noisy and not cooling. How long has it been doing that?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: About a week

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, about a week. Has anything changed with it recently — like the light turning off or the freezer warming up too?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Sometimes the light turns off and freezer warms up

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, that helps — the light cutting out and freezer warming up are good signs it's failing. Could I get your addres- co I can log the repair properly

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Yes 345 Miller street

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, thanks for that - 345 Miller Street. Could you tell me your unit number as well so I can send the technician to the right place?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: House1,room5

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, House 1, Room 5 - got it. When are you available for a technician to come and check the fridge?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: 1pm on Saturday is the best

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, 1 pm on Saturday works. Will someone be home at that time to let the technician in?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: I'll be home and let them in

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, good to know you'll be there. Before I book it in, could I get yr - contact number in case the technician ne to call you on arrival?

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, thanks, I've got your number noted. Just so I can mark the urgency, is the fridge completely not cooling now, or is it still a little bit cold inside?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: It's still a little bit cold inside

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, a little cold but not holding properly thanks. Would you like me to go ahead and confirm the Saturday 1 pm technician for you?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Yes please

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, the Saturday 1 pm technician is now confirmed for your fridge repair. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Nothing thank you

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, thanks — just give us a call if anything else comes up. Have a good day.
